channel.title: Error
channel.description:
I GOT THIS ERROR
[code]client.java:9764: cannot find symbol symbol : variable blinded location: class client person.blinded = true; ^ client.java:9765: cannot find symbol symbol : variable bTimer location: class client person.bTimer = 120; ^ client.java:12967: cannot find symbol symbol : variable blinded location: class client if (blinded) { ^ client.java:12968: cannot find symbol symbol : variable bTimer location: class client bTimer -= 1; ^ client.java:12969: cannot find symbol symbol : variable bTimer location: class client if (bTimer == 119) { ^ client.java:12972: cannot find symbol symbol : variable bTimer location: class client if (bTimer <= 0) { ^ client.java:12973: cannot find symbol symbol : variable blinded location: class client blinded = false; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 7 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code] how do i fix this

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“bakatool, post:36, topic:154950”]public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
if (blinded) {
bTimer -= 1;
if (bTimer == 119) {
sendMessage(“You’ve been blinded!”);
}
if (bTimer <= 0) {
blinded = false;
setInterfaceWalkable(65535);
sendMessage(“You can see again.”);
} else {
setInterfaceWalkable(13583);
}
}

you can’t just call a if statement without a method atleast a client constructor or something all that code belongs in process() method inside client.java

w00t 2 more errors

client.java:50: ';' expected [b]under that add[/b] public static boolean blinded = true; ^ client.java:50: <identifier> expected [b]under that add[/b] public static boolean blinded = true; ^ 2 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Really now?

why do you have [b ]under that add[. /b ] in JAVA code? thats forum BBCode. [/quote]
Well, I meant to bold it, because he has under that add in his boolean declaration.

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
if (blinded) {
bTimer -= 1;
if (bTimer == 119) {
sendMessage(“You’ve been blinded!”);
}
if (bTimer <= 0) {
blinded = false;
setInterfaceWalkable(65535);
sendMessage(“You can see again.”);
} else {
setInterfaceWalkable(13583);
}
}

you can’t just call a if statement without a method atleast a client constructor or something all that code belongs in process() method inside client.java

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:33, topic:154950”][quote author=nfl052 link=topic=211604.msg1850724#msg1850724 date=1193564221]
w00t 2 more errors

client.java:50: ';' expected [b]under that add[/b] public static boolean blinded = true; ^ client.java:50: <identifier> expected [b]under that add[/b] public static boolean blinded = true; ^ 2 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]
Really now?[/quote]

why do you have [b ]under that add[. /b ] in JAVA code? thats forum BBCode.

Read full topic

item.title: Error

item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

boolean blinded = false;

Replace line 50 in your client.java with that.

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @nfl052 nfl052
item.description:
@nfl052 wrote:

[code]ok let me restart what it

ok i put if (blinded) { bTimer -= 1; if (bTimer == 119) { sendMessage("You've been blinded!"); } if (bTimer <= 0) { blinded = false; setInterfaceWalkable(65535); sendMessage("You can see again."); } else { setInterfaceWalkable(13583); } } under
public boolean process() {
and i put if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("blinder")) { int Slot = GetItemSlot(36); if (Slot == -1) { sendMessage("You need a candle to use the blinder."); } else { deleteItem(36,getItemSlot(36),1); int range = 20; for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { if(person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= range && person.playerId != playerId) { person.blinded = true; person.bTimer = 120; person.EntangleDelay = 120; } } } } } } and now i have these errors client.java:9764: cannot find symbol symbol : variable blinded location: class client person.blinded = true; ^ client.java:9765: cannot find symbol symbol : variable bTimer location: class client person.bTimer = 120; ^ client.java:12967: cannot find symbol symbol : variable blinded location: class client if (blinded) { ^ client.java:12968: cannot find symbol symbol : variable bTimer location: class client bTimer -= 1; ^ client.java:12969: cannot find symbol symbol : variable bTimer location: class client if (bTimer == 119) { ^ client.java:12972: cannot find symbol symbol : variable bTimer location: class client if (bTimer <= 0) { ^ client.java:12973: cannot find symbol symbol : variable blinded location: class client blinded = false; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 7 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . . ok how do i fix them and plz help me dont just fight[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: October 27, 2007, 10:14:08 PM[/size][hr]no one knows how to fix it

Read full topic
